---
title: "Day 2: Slope"
format: html
---

```{r}
#| include: false

library(tidyverse)

df <- read_csv('bookings.csv', col_names = c("date", "count"), skip=1)

```


```{r}
df  |> 
 ggplot(aes(x=date, y=count)) +
  geom_area(alpha=0.4) + 
  geom_smooth(se=FALSE) + 
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x=NULL, y=NULL, title="Cocnur T2 bookings in March 2025")


```
